name: False Dichotomy video game Demo
description:
New Demo!
You're a Demon-Killer on a search and rescue mission. False Dichotomy is a sci-fi/spiritual, psychological Shooter that takes place in the spiritual world. 
Explore. Fight. Search. Survive. Find the Portals. You are Sgt. Richard Cooke, an unretired pilot for a clandestine organization. Enter into the spiritual world in search of a fallen comrade. Destroy the demons as you try to survive the unseen plane while your sins are remembered.
